body:
SMTP module

This is the SMTP module that allows you to send emails
smtp
Tangler\Module\Smtp\Module

Action: New email action

This action sends a new email
new_email
Tangler\Module\Smtp\SendEmailAction
  • smtp.host (string): SMTP Server hostname
  • smtp.username (string): Username
  • smtp.password (string): Password
  • subject (string): Subject
  • body (string): Body
  • to (string): To address
  • from (string): From address
